articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: New warnings over US shift on Jerusalem
articles.description: France is the latest nation to warn Donald Trump against recognising Jerusalem as Israel's capital.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Supreme court backs Trump travel ban
articles.description: US Supreme Court allows President Trump's travel ban on six mainly Muslim countries to go fully into effect

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Ocean plastic a 'planetary crisis' - UN
articles.description: Life in the seas risks irreparable damage from the ever-increasing tide of plastic waste, the UN's head of oceans has warned.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: PM in Brussels for key Brexit talks
articles.description: EU officials say deals were reached at the weekend on the UK "divorce bill" and citizens' rights.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump ends federal protection for US parks
articles.description: Bears Ears and Grand Staircase Escalante monuments are expected to be significantly reduced.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 6,500 people buy crumbling castle
articles.description: Internet users join forces to buy Mothe-Chandeniers chateau in France, hoping to restore it.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Yiannopoulos event prompts violent protests
articles.description: Australian police arrest two people in clashes over a talk hosted by the ultra-conservative figure.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Why yellow is banned in Catalonia
articles.description: Yellow lights, yellow ribbons, even yellow fountains are not allowed.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Freddie Mercury film director fired
articles.description: The film, titled Bohemian Rhapsody, will tell the story of the late Queen frontman's life.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Millions misspent' during Mandela funeral
articles.description: Money earmarked for schools and hospitals was used for commemorative T-shirts, a report says.
